name: sap-example
description: This is the example plugin for Super Agent Party, demonstrating the plugin architecture and capabilities.
description_zh: Super Agent Party 示例插件，用于展示插件架构与基本功能。
author: heshengtao

name: sap-example-with-node
description: This is a chat frontend example with nodeJS environment
description_zh: 一个基于 NodeJS 环境的聊天前端示例插件。
author: heshengtao

name: sap-web-preview
description: A plugin that enables web previewing functionality for Super Agent Party.
description_zh: 为 Super Agent Party 提供网页预览功能的扩展插件。
author: heshengtao

name: sap-story-adventure
description: An interactive story adventure plugin that generates story content and options using AI
description_zh: 互动式故事冒险插件，利用 AI 动态生成故事情节和交互选项。
author: heshengtao

name: sap-live2d
description: This is a Live 2D extension for the Super Agent Party
description_zh: 为 Super Agent Party 开发的 Live 2D 看板娘扩展模块。
author: heshengtao

name: sap-aieditor
description_zh: 一个集成了 AI 能力的文本编辑器。
author: heshengtao

name: sap-aigalgame
description: This is a AI galgame extension for the Super Agent Party
description_zh: 基于 AI 驱动的 Galgame（美少女游戏）扩展插件。
author: heshengtao

name: sap-tarot
description_zh: AI 塔罗牌占卜插件，提供神秘学咨询体验。
author: heshengtao

name: sap-ai-sheet
author: heshengtao
description: SheetNext AI Excel Editor Plugin for Super Agent Party
description_zh: SheetNext AI 表格/Excel 编辑器插件。

name: sap-ai-drawio
description: This is a drawio extension for the Super Agent Party
description_zh: 集成 Draw.io 功能的流程图与架构图编辑器插件。
author: heshengtao

name: sap-ai-mermaid
description: This is a mermaid editor extension for the Super Agent Party
description_zh: Mermaid.js 语法支持的图表编辑器插件。
author: heshengtao

name: sap-rss
description: This is a RSS reader extension for the Super Agent Party
description_zh: RSS 订阅与阅读器扩展插件。
author: heshengtao
